== Main Inclusion Report for bughelper ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in Ubuntu universe http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/b/bughelper, `Architecure: all`.
 0. ''Rationale:''  
** Provides an Interface for downloading bug attachments, needed by apport. (`python-launchpad-bugs` is going to be a apport dependency.)
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** We are upstream.
** No critical bugs, just feature enhancements: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/bughelper/+bugs|bughelper bugs]]</nowiki>.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard CDBS python module packaging
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** all already in main
